scripts.android: npm run build && npx cap sync android && npx cap run android --scan
scripts.addAndroid: npx cap add android && mkdir ./android/app/src/main/jniLibs && cp -rf ./android/capacitor-cordova-android-plugins/src/main/libs/* ./android/app/src/main/jniLibs
scripts.coldStartAndroid: npm i && npm run build && npm run copyCadenzaMaps && npm run addAndroid && npm run android
scripts.copyAndRunAndroid: npm run copyCadenzaMaps && npm run android
scripts.ios: npm i && npx cap sync ios && npx cap run ios
scripts.coldStartIos: npm i && npm run build && npm run copyCadenzaMaps && npm run addIos && npm run openIos
